client

Class ChatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ChatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ChatClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This class overrides some of the methods defined in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the client.
    Version:
    November 2018
    Author:
    Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge, Dr Robert Laganiè, François Bélanger, Delton Vaz (edition for OOSE), William D'amico (edition for OOSE)

      Constructs an instance of the chat client.
      ChatClient(java.lang.String host, int port, ChatIF clientUI, java.lang.String username)
      Constructs an instance of the chat client with username.
